If you are interested in my research, feel free to contact me. About¶ I am an associate professor at School of Computer Science and Technology, Xi'an Jiaotong University. I received my B.E. degree from Xi'an Jiaotong University in 2013, and Ph.D. degree from Tsinghua University in 2018.
